title: Clinic Lead Stack
subtitle: Chiropractic content & patient engagement platform
projectOverview: Clinic Lead Stack helps chiropractors simplify patient education and engagement. The platform provides a calendar-first dashboard, AI-powered script generation for spinal health and wellness tips, newsletter creation from videos, and branded reels remixing. With a central knowledge base, every output is personalized to match a clinic's voice, style, and brand guidelines.

techStack.otherTools: JWT for authentication, Resend for email delivery, Instagram API & YouTube API for reel upload and management

title: REC LiiGA
subtitle: Recreational sports league platform
projectOverview: REC LiiGA is a free-to-use app designed to make recreational sports more fun and competitive by bringing the excitement of fantasy sports to drop-in games. It offers features like team drafting, player ratings, individual leaderboards, and event management, while helping organizers streamline league management and enhancing player engagement.

techStack.otherTools: JWT for authentication, Cloud storage for media

title: ScoutSesh
subtitle: Athlete development platform
projectOverview: ScoutSesh is a comprehensive athlete development platform designed to elevate athletes' performance across all levels and sports. It provides tailored training programs, skill development modules, and performance tracking tools for athletes and coaches. The platform facilitates seamless collaboration between athletes and coaches, ensuring data-driven insights and structured progression plans.

techStack.otherTools: JWT for authentication, Stripe for payments, Google Meet API for meeting scheduling, Tailwind CSS for styling

title: LearnEx
subtitle: Online learning platform
projectOverview: LearnEx is a comprehensive learning management system (LMS) designed to empower educators and learners with seamless course creation, interactive learning experiences, and efficient progress tracking. It focuses on providing an engaging and user-friendly interface, and secure access to educational resources. The platform is built for scalability, making it suitable for institutions, businesses, and independent educators of any size.

techStack.otherTools: JWT for authentication, Tailwind CSS for styling

title: Shopparel
subtitle: Fashion e-commerce website
projectOverview: Shopparel is a dynamic e-commerce platform designed for fashion enthusiasts to browse, purchase, and manage their favorite apparel seamlessly. It focuses on providing an engaging and responsive user experience, secure transactions, and efficient order management. The platform is tailored for scalability, making it suitable for businesses of any size.

techStack.otherTools: JWT for authentication, Tailwind CSS for styling

title: Bloggerzine
subtitle: Blog website
projectOverview: Bloggerzine is a scalable blog platform tailored for writers and readers across various niches. It allows writers to publish engaging articles effortlessly and readers to explore diverse content. With features like secure user authentication and real-time content updates, Bloggerzine is a go-to hub for content creators and consumers alike.

techStack.otherTools: TypeScript for scalability, Supabase Authentication for secure user access

title: Estate Haven
subtitle: Real estate website
projectOverview: Estate-Haven is a comprehensive real estate platform aimed at simplifying property listings and searches for users. The platform enables property owners to list their properties while potential buyers and renters can search and filter options based on location, price, and other criteria. Its user-friendly design ensures seamless navigation and accessibility across devices.

techStack.otherTools: TypeScript for scalability, JWT for authentication

title: Pikxr
subtitle: Social media website
projectOverview: Pikxr is an innovative photo-sharing platform designed for photographers and enthusiasts to share, explore, and appreciate high-quality images. It includes features like dynamic image galleries, social interactions, and a clean, responsive interface. Pikxr provides a creative space where users can showcase their work and connect with a like-minded community.
